text: ♪ Can I call you baby? ♪
♪ Can you be my friend? ♪

♪ Can you be my lover up until
the very end? ♪

pretend ♪

♪ Stick by my side even when the
world is caving in, yeah ♪

♪ Oh, oh, oh, don't, don't you
worry ♪

♪ I'll be there whenever you
want me ♪

♪ I need somebody who can love

do the worst ♪
